PUSHER | Junior Designer | London | Onsite, full-time Hello there! Do you want to design something that makes developers’ lives better? Pusher is all about helping developers. Our website, dashboard, docs and other projects are key to our success. It needs to be thoughtfully designed, simple and fast.

At Pusher, designers implement what they design, which means writing code. ️ We’re looking for a designer-developer who believes that design can make a meaningful difference and cares about how it is implemented. You will make sure that Pusher looks awesome, and has equally awesome code. Why Pusher? There are more than 20 million developers in the world with millions of “soon to be developers” currently in colleges, universities, coding bootcamps or teaching themselves how to code via online courses or tutorials. These are your customers. We believe that in the next ten years, every company will become a software company and developers will need great tools to be productive and do their jobs.

Check the job out here: https://pusher.workable.com/jobs/597251
